transportMode.title: Transport Mode
transportMode.description: Select the primary mode of transportation for this expedition

AIR.name: Air Transport
AIR.description: Fast delivery via aircraft. Ideal for urgent shipments and long distances.

SEA.name: Sea Transport
SEA.description: Cost-effective shipping via ocean freight. Best for large volumes.

LAND.name: Land Transport
LAND.description: Ground transportation via trucks or road vehicles.

RAIL.name: Rail Transport
RAIL.description: Transportation via railway networks. Good for medium distances.

MULTIMODAL.name: Multimodal Transport
MULTIMODAL.description: Combination of multiple transport modes for optimal efficiency.

providerType.title: Provider Type
providerType.description: Choose how you want to handle the transportation for this expedition

REGISTERED.name: Registered Provider
REGISTERED.description: Use one of our verified and registered transportation providers.

OWN.name: Own Carrier
OWN.description: Use your own transportation carrier or logistics company.

THIRD_PARTY.name: Third Party
THIRD_PARTY.description: Use an external logistics provider not registered in our system.

approved.title: Account Approved
approved.description: Welcome to AvolShip! Your seller account has been approved and is now active.

access.title: Full Platform Access
access.description: You now have access to all seller features, including inventory management, order processing, and shipping tools.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Integration
warehouse.description: Connect with warehouses across multiple countries to manage your inventory efficiently.

tools.description: Access analytics, reporting, and optimization tools to grow your business and improve performance.

approved.support: If you need any assistance, please contact our support team at

rejected.title: Account Rejected
rejected.description: Unfortunately, your application to become a seller on AvolShip was not approved at this time.

reason.title: Possible Reasons
reason.description: Your application may have been rejected for one or more of the following reasons:

verification.title: Verification Issues
verification.description: We couldn't verify your business information or documents provided were incomplete.

information.title: Incomplete Information
information.description: Some required information was missing or incorrect in your application.

requirements.title: Business Requirements
requirements.description: Your business doesn't currently meet our platform requirements for sellers.

reapply.title: Reapply
reapply.description: You can address the issues and resubmit your application after 30 days.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: For more specific details about your rejection, please contact our support team.

support.title: Get Help
support.description: Our support team can guide you through the requirements and help you prepare for reapplication.

rejected.appealText: If you believe there's been a mistake, please email us at

pending.title: Application Under Review
pending.description: Your application is currently being reviewed by our team. This process typically takes 1-3 business days.

timeframe.title: Review Timeframe
timeframe.description: Most applications are processed within 1-3 business days, but some may take longer depending on verification needs.

notification.title: Email Notification
notification.description: You'll receive an email notification once your application has been approved or if we need additional information.

questions.title: Questions?
questions.description: If you have any questions about your application status, please contact our support team.

pending.checkEmail: Please check your email for updates.

home.heroSubtitle: Simplify fulfillment with our centralized platform for warehousing, inventory tracking, and seamless delivery management across multiple African countries.
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to streamline your logistics and fulfillment operations
home.feature1Desc: Manage multi-country operations from a single dashboard with real-time inventory tracking and automated order processing.
home.feature1Benefit1: Real-time inventory tracking across all warehouses
home.feature1Benefit2: Simplified order management with bulk import tools
home.feature1Benefit3: Automated stock updates for confirmed orders and returns
home.feature2Desc: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive analytics on sales, warehouse capacity, and delivery performance.
home.feature2Benefit1: Visualize sales trends and forecast demand patterns
home.feature2Benefit2: Track delivery performance metrics and identify bottlenecks
home.feature2Benefit3: Generate exportable reports in multiple formats (PDF, Excel, CSV)
home.feature3Desc: Seamlessly expand your business with our network covering multiple African countries with integrated local support.
home.feature3Benefit1: Operate in 15+ African countries with a single platform
home.feature3Benefit2: Localized shipping rates and delivery options
home.feature3Benefit3: Multi-currency support and automated exchange rate updates
home.feature4Desc: Protect your data and operations with advanced security features, role-based access control, and encrypted communications.
home.feature4Benefit1: Role-based access control for team members
home.feature4Benefit2: Two-factor authentication and secure password policies
home.feature4Benefit3: End-to-end encryption for sensitive customer data
home.featuresExploreHint: Discover how our platform can transform your logistics operations
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to transform your logistics operations
home.step1Desc: Create your account, set up your warehouses, and configure your products.
home.step2Desc: Process orders, schedule deliveries, and track inventory in real-time.
home.step3Desc: Expand operations across countries with detailed analytics and insights.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Discover how AvolShip has transformed logistics for businesses across Africa
home.testimonial1: AvolShip has completely revolutionized our delivery process. The real-time tracking and centralized dashboard have saved us countless hours of manual work.
home.testimonial2: Expanding to multiple countries was seamless with AvolShip. Their platform handles all the complexity, allowing us to focus on growing our business.
home.testimonial3: The delivery success rate improved by 24% after implementing AvolShip. Their customer support team is always responsive and helpful.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Logistics Operations?
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using AvolShip to streamline their fulfillment across Africa.
home.footerTagline: Streamlining logistics and fulfillment operations across Africa.
home.stayUpdated: Subscribe to stay updated with the latest features and news.
